content.raw:
There are 2 cases of dead balls:

If the balls stops behind the 2 men bar, it is dropped from the corner on that side. This is because it is in an area that is under a single team's control (there's a goaler and 2 defense players from the same team)

If the dead ball is elsewhere, then the ball is put back in the center.

Do we want to implement this?
